author: ramiro
message:
Fixed translatability of application names in admin app.

Also, made usage of the `filter` template tag consistent in some
breadcrumbs elements across the different admin templates.

Fixes #10436.

git-svn-id: http://code.djangoproject.com/svn/django/trunk@17378 bcc190cf-cafb-0310-a4f2-bffc1f526a37

files.patch:
@@ -358,7 +358,7 @@ def index(self, request, extra_context=None):
                         app_dict[app_label]['models'].append(model_dict)
                     else:
                         app_dict[app_label] = {
-                            'name': app_label.title(),
+                            'name': app_label,
                             'app_url': reverse('admin:app_list', kwargs={'app_label': app_label}, current_app=self.name),
                             'has_module_perms': has_module_perms,
                             'models': [model_dict],
@@ -415,7 +415,7 @@ def app_index(self, request, app_label, extra_context=None):
                             # something to display, add in the necessary meta
                             # information.
                             app_dict = {
-                                'name': app_label.title(),
+                                'name': app_label,
                                 'app_url': '',
                                 'has_module_perms': has_module_perms,
                                 'models': [model_dict],
@@ -425,7 +425,7 @@ def app_index(self, request, app_label, extra_context=None):
         # Sort the models alphabetically within each app.
         app_dict['models'].sort(key=lambda x: x['name'])
         context = {
-            'title': _('%s administration') % capfirst(app_label),
+            'title': _('%(app_label)s administration') % {'app_label': capfirst(_(app_label))},
             'app_list': [app_dict],
         }
         context.update(extra_context or {})

@@ -13,8 +13,8 @@ {% block breadcrumbs %}
{% trans 'Home' %} -› {{ opts.app_label|capfirst|escape }} -› {{ opts.verbose_name_plural|capfirst }} +› {% trans opts.app_label|capfirst|escape %} +› {{ opts.verbose_name_plural|capfirst|escape }} › {{ original|truncatewords:"18" }} › {% trans 'Change password' %}

@@ -6,7 +6,7 @@ {% block breadcrumbs %}
{% trans 'Home' %} -› {{ app_label|capfirst }} +› {% trans app_label|capfirst|escape %} › {{ opts.verbose_name_plural|capfirst|escape }} › {{ object|truncatewords:"18" }} › {% trans 'Delete' %}

@@ -6,8 +6,8 @@ {% block breadcrumbs %}
{% trans 'Home' %} -› {{ app_label|capfirst|escape }} -› {{ opts.verbose_name_plural|capfirst }} +› {% trans app_label|capfirst|escape %} +› {{ opts.verbose_name_plural|capfirst|escape }} › {% trans 'Delete multiple objects' %}
{% endblock %}

@@ -6,7 +6,7 @@ {% block breadcrumbs %}
{% trans 'Home' %} -› {{ app_label|capfirst|escape }} +› {% trans app_label|capfirst|escape %} › {{ module_name }} › {{ object|truncatewords:"18" }} › {% trans 'History' %}
